article_title: Governor’s statement on federal ‘guidance to schools’ about ‘transgenders’ very weak
article_text:
Paris, TN (38242)

Today

Generally cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
